HEBREW: וַיֵּֽצְאוּ֙ בְּנֵ֣י עַמּ֔וֹן וַיַּעַרְכ֥וּ מִלְחָמָ֖ה פֶּ֣תַח הַשָּׁ֑עַר וַאֲרַ֨ם צוֹבָ֤א וּרְחוֹב֙ וְאִֽישׁ־ט֣וֹב וּמַֽעֲכָ֔ה לְבַדָּ֖ם בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃
ENGLISH: And the children of ῾Ammon came out, and put the battle in array at the entrance of the gate: and Aram of Żova, and of Reĥov, and Ish-tov, and Ma῾akha were by themselves in the open country.
